forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening settles over Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere is a medley of calm and crispness, with a gentle embrace of the cool air lingering around 51 degrees. A light west-southwest wind dances through the streets, carrying whispers of the sea, while the fluffy allure of partly cloudy skies offers a glimpse of evening introspection, particularly as the sun dips lower on the horizon.

Looking ahead to tomorrow, the promise of a mostly sunny day awaits, with temperatures reaching a pleasant high near 61, before drifting slightly lower as the afternoon unfolds. The mild winds may pick up a bit, urging you to keep a light jacket close at hand for your early wanderings. For those seeking a simple pleasure, a stroll along the Embarcadero could be just the remedy, perhaps stopping by a local café for some warm coffee, as the city comes alive in the soft glow of a new day. Whether you're meeting friends or simply investigating the hidden corners of your own neighborhood, the blend of sun and breeze will render the day inviting, allowing you to savor the essence of this vibrant urban landscape.
